Segment.name: ER
Segment.comment: To supply information regarding movement of shipments

Field.name: EventCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the event about which a report is made

Field.name: StandardPointLocationCode
Field.comment: Code (Standard Point Location) defined by National Motor Freight Tariff Association (NMFTA) or the Canadian Transportation Agency (CTA) point development group as the official code assigned to a city or point (for ratemaking purposes) within a city

Field.name: DateTimeQualifier
Field.comment: Code specifying type of date or time, or both date and time

Field.name: DateTimePeriodFormatQualifier
Field.comment: Code indicating the date format, time format, or date and time format

Field.name: DateTimePeriod
Field.comment: Expression of a date, a time, or range of dates, times or dates and times

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: LoadEmptyStatusCode
Field.comment: Code which specifies the loaded condition of transportation equipment
